name: Tension
summary_text: A meek pharmacist creates an alternate identity under which he plans to murder the bullying liquor salesman who has become his wife's lover.

name: Microbe et Gasoil
summary_text: Two young friends embark on a road trip across France in a vehicle they built themselves.

name: Messenger of Death
summary_text: A Denver reporter investigates the mass murder of a family of Mormons in rural Colorado.

name: Caesar and Cleopatra
summary_text: At the height of the Roman Civil War, a young Cleopatra (Vivien Leigh) meets a middle-aged Julius Caesar (Claude Rains), who teaches her how to rule Egypt.

name: Still the Water
summary_text: On a subtropical island, a teenage couple deal with the interwoven cycle of life, death and love.

name: Despite the Falling Snow
summary_text: In Cold War Moscow, a female spy steals secrets from an idealistic politician - and falls in love with him.

name: Storm
summary_text: A shiftless loner finds that he suddenly has something worth living for, as he tries to protect the enigmatic love of his life from the men who want to do her harm.

name: Fifty Pills
summary_text: Unless Darren can survive New York's largest drug mogul, write a paper on Dante's "Inferno," escape three thugs chasing the wrong guy and sell fifty pills of ecstasy to make his tuition payment, he'll never date the girl of his dreams.

name: Female Prisoner Scorpion: Jailhouse 41
summary_text: After spending a year in solitary confinement, Matsu escapes from prison with six more convicts, followed by the guards led by the vengeful warden who wants her dead at all costs.

name: The Magnificent Seven Ride!
summary_text: Forced by personal circumstances, Marshal Chris Adams recruits a writer and five prisoners to help him eliminate a gang of Mexican bandits.

name: Modesty Blaise
summary_text: Stylish ex-con Modesty Blaise and her partner Willie Garvin are tasked by the British Secret Service with preventing her rival Gabriel from stealing diamonds that are to be delivered to her adoptive father, a Sheikh.

name: Eisenstein in Guanajuato
summary_text: The venerated filmmaker Eisenstein is comparable in talent, insight and wisdom, with the likes of Shakespeare or Beethoven; there are few - if any - directors who can be elevated to such ...                See full summary »

name: Dossier K.
summary_text: Vincke and Verstuyft are detectives of the Antwerp police department. This time they have to deal with the Albanian mob and some problems in their own police division.

name: Kids in America
summary_text: A diverse group of high school students band together to peacefully stick it to their overbearing principal.

name: La demoiselle d'honneur
summary_text: A hard-working young man meets and falls in love with his sister's bridesmaid. He soon finds out how disturbed she really is.

name: Red Water
summary_text: A group of oil workers being held hostage by a group of gangsters on a small oil rig are attacked by a freshwater bull shark.

name: Az Karkheh ta Rhein
summary_text: Saeed who is suffering from injuries that he received in the Iran-Iraq War, is sent to Germany for treatments. In Germany, he meets his sister and her German husband. Saeed and his sister ...                See full summary »

name: La voce della luna
summary_text: The amusing and entertaining adventures of a recently released mental patient and his band of misfits, discover conspiracies to concur while looking for love.

name: Superstition
summary_text: A witch put to death in 1692 swears vengeance on her persecutors and returns to the present day to punish their descendants.

name: Where Danger Lives
summary_text: A young doctor falls in love with a disturbed young woman, becomes involved in the death of her husband, and has to flee with her to the Mexican border.

name: Hyeong
summary_text: Doo-Sik (Jo Jung-suk) gets paroled from prison thanks to his younger brother (Do Kyung-Soo) Doo-Young. Doo-Young is a promising judo athlete. After 15 years, Doo-Sik (Jo Jung-suk) suddenly ...                See full summary »

name: The Northlander
summary_text: In the year 2961, the time is after humanity and nature has recovered the land. A hunter named Cygnus is called to protect his people. He travels across a desert valley to protect his tribe against a band of Heretics. Cygnus must find a way for his tribe to survive.

name: It's a Fairy!
summary_text: Geraldine is a fairy who lost their wings by using unconventional methods in their missions. His last chance to retrieve them will be the mission "Julia".

name: The Legacy
summary_text: An American couple in England stumble upon a rambling mansion where a number of powerful individuals have been summoned by its patriarch regarding the home's legacy.

name: Oru Vadakkan Selfie
summary_text: When his father asks him to manage their grocery store, Umesh leaves for Chennai to become a filmmaker. His life changes, after he takes a selfie with his neighbor and posts it online.

name: Barbecue
summary_text: On his 50th birthday, a man who's been watching his weight, health and temper all his life suffers a heart attack. He's been doing everything he was told he should do and it still didn't help. He decides to turn the page and let loose.

name: The Philadelphia Experiment
summary_text: In 1943, a secret government cloaking project goes awry vanishing a navy destroyer. In 2013, the destroyer reappears, setting off a series of events threatening to destroy the world.

name: What's Your Raashee?
summary_text: A young man has only ten days to locate his soulmate as dictated by the stars, otherwise he could lose a fortune. He thus embarks on a journey through love, looking through twelve girls to find the one who fits his horoscope.

name: Who'll Stop the Rain
summary_text: This gripping, action-intensive and thought-provoking film focuses on the drama and desperation of drug smuggling and heroin addiction and stars Nick Nolte and Tuesday Weld. In HD.

name: Freaky Ali
summary_text: A debt collector becomes a golfing sensation.

name: Beul-la-in-deu
summary_text: Su-a loses her sight and kid brother in a car accident. No more police academy. 3 years later she takes a taxi which hits a woman. Su-a gets out. After reporting it, a cop works with her learning that her 4 other senses "see".

name: Linewatch
summary_text: Dixon patrols the US/Mexican border. He's recognized from years ago in an LA gang. The gang needs his help smuggling drugs across the border and holds his wife and daughter hostage.

name: A Cinderella Christmas
summary_text: Angie works hard to run her uncle's events business while her cousin Candace takes the credit. When Angie takes a night off to have fun at the Christmasquerade Ball, the mask and gown allow...                See full summary »

name: What If...
summary_text: Ben Walker is allowed to see how different his life would be if he had followed his heart.

name: Double Vision
summary_text: An FBI Agent pairs with a troubled Taiwan cop to hunt for a serial killer who's embedding a mysterious fungus in the brains of victims.

name: Muqaddar Ka Sikandar
summary_text: When a homeless and orphaned young man finds work in the house of a wealthy man, he falls in love with the daughter of that wealthy man. But things start to change a lot thereafter.

summary_text: Teenagers Libby and Kit innocently spend an evening making random prank calls. These calls lead to murderous consequences.

name: Lemonade Joe
summary_text: Straight shooting Lemonade Joe cleans up Stetson City, in this musical parody of early Westerns, after shooting the pants off villain Old Pistol. Joe's endorsement of Kolaloka (Crazy Cola) ...                See full summary »

name: The Canterville Ghost
summary_text: The descendent of a ghost imprisoned for cowardice hopes to free the spirit by displaying courage when under duress.

name: Happy Campers
summary_text: When a summer camp director gets injured, the diverse group of college freshmen counselors take charge and spice up the everyday routine of the camp.

name: Love Happy
summary_text: The Marx Brothers help young Broadway hopefuls while thwarting diamond thieves.

name: Blame
summary_text: A drama teacher's taboo relationship with an unstable student strikes a nerve in her jealous classmate, sparking a vengeful chain of events within their suburban high school that draws parallels to 'The Crucible'.

name: 100% Love
summary_text: When his cousin Mahalakshmi comes to stay, Balu is challenged to an extent rare in his charmed life. Will Balu let himself be seduced by Mahalakshmi's bubbly spirit and sharp brain, or will his ego prove an insurmountable barrier?

name: As Luck Would Have It
summary_text: An out-of-work publicist who suffers an accident looks to sell the exclusive interview rights to the highest bidder in an attempt to provide for his family.

name: Mrs. Miracle
summary_text: Overwhelmed widower Seth Webster is searching for a housekeeper to help him with his unruly six year old twin sons. "Mrs. Miracle" mysteriously appears and quickly becomes an irreplaceable nanny, chef, friend... and matchmaker.

name: Narco
summary_text: Gus (played by Guillaume Canet) suffers from narcolepsy. He falls asleep all the time and has dreams about supermen from comics (Van Damme would play one of these supermen, a short & secret appearance).

name: The Breed
summary_text: When a rogue vampire kills his partner, an FBI special agent reluctantly teams with another officerwho is a "good" vampire in an attempt to track down the evil vampire killer.

name: The Lusty Men
summary_text: Retired rodeo champion Jeff McCloud agrees to mentor novice rodeo contestant Wes Merritt against the wishes of Merritt's wife who fears the dangers of this rough sport.

name: The Merry Widow
summary_text: When a small kingdom's main tax payer leaves for Paris, its king dispatches a dashing count to win back her allegiance.

name: Loro 2
summary_text: Set mostly in his Sardinian mansion, Silvio Berlusconi's personality, politic career, scandals, relationship with his wife and ambiguous heritage are presented through partially fictional events.

name: Prasthanam
summary_text: A politician's hot-blooded son starts to rebel uncontrollably when his intelligent stepbrother is chosen as the heir to the throne.

name: Bichunmoo
summary_text: A sweeping, epic tale of a martial arts warrior who attempts to defy a kingdom to be with his love.

name: The Houses October Built 2
summary_text: Recovering from the trauma of being kidnapped last Halloween by the Blue Skeleton, five friends head back out to visit more haunted house attractions. But when signs of the Blue Skeleton start appearing again a new terror begins.

name: The Crew
summary_text: As a major heist approaches and with betrayal all around him, a respected crime boss has to summon all his street nous and killer instinct as he fights for survival.

name: Ponmagal Vandhal
summary_text: Ponmagal Vandhal (Meaning: The Precious Princess has Arrived) is a courtroom drama that takes place in Ooty. Jyotika plays the lead in the film alongside various other veteran actors playing important roles.

name: Eddie's Million Dollar Cook-Off
summary_text: Eddie loves baseball. His dad's the coach, his best friends are his teammates. But will he strike out with them all if he trades his glove for an oven mitt.

name: Scissors
summary_text: A woman trying to recover from a sexual attack is locked in a posh apartment with a corpse of the very man she's been dreaming would murder her. She tries to hang on to reality when objects around her seem to come to life.

name: Run
summary_text: When a law student accidentally kills the son of a mob boss in a fight, he finds himself relentlessly pursued by the mob and the police.

name: Dobro pozhalovat, ili Postoronnim vkhod vospreshchen
summary_text: A satirical comedy about the excessive restrictions that children face during their vacation in a Young Pioneer camp.

name: Ziegfeld Girl
summary_text: In the 1920s, three women become performers in the renowned Broadway show the Ziegfeld Follies, where they find fame, love, and tragedy.

name: Never Goin' Back
summary_text: Jessie and Angela, high school dropouts, are taking a week off to chill at the beach. Too bad their house got robbed, rent's due, they're about to get fired, and they're broke.

summary_text: Iliza Shlesinger performs in this standup talking about dating, feminism and some of the intricacies associated with being a woman in the 21st century.

name: Gasht-e ershad
summary_text: Three fellows are gaining money by faking that they are Gashte Ershad (a special police for arresting guys and girls that wear clothes in a bad way).

summary_text: The year is 2048, and global warming has flooded much of Earth's land areas. A father and his two sons try to salvage treasures from sunken buildings when they are given an important assignment by the New Vatican.

name: The Gene Generation
summary_text: Michelle, an assassin to a new breed of killers (DNA Hackers), finds she has greater obstacles in her life... Family.

name: Raja Babu

summary_text: During World War I, a British aristocrat, an American entrepreneur, and the latter's attractive young daughter, set out to destroy a German battlecruiser, which is awaiting repairs in an inlet just off Zanzibar.

summary_text: The story of eleven prostitutes who refuse to part ways with their brothel and each other during the partition between India and Pakistan.

name: The Snowman and the Snowdog

summary_text: 16 y.o. Danish high school sophomore Viktor falls in love with senior Anja at 1st hiccup. Their little brothers (BFFs) invite him to Anja's 18th birthday party. Viktor's 2 friends also help. Where does Anja's arrogant boyfriend fit in?

name: Burning Sands

summary_text: In WW2, the Allies race against time to persuade two nuclear scientists working for the Germans to switch sides.

name: The Steam Experiment
summary_text: A deranged scientist locks 6 people in a steam room and threatens to turn up the heat if the local paper doesn't publish his story about global warming.

name: Joe the King
summary_text: A disadvantaged, abused, neglected, exploited but basically decent kid slips into criminality while trying to cope with his harsh, inescapable reality.

name: Saps at Sea
summary_text: Oliver suffers a nervous breakdown as a result of working in a horn factory, but when he follows doctor's orders about sea air, he finds an ex-con is aboard.

summary_text: Durham is slowly dying like the tobacco business, it once depended on. Leroy comes to Durham with a business plan. He rents an old warehouse from a cash-strapped old tobacco heiress.

name: Pinjar
summary_text: In the days leading up to Partition, a Hindu woman is abducted by a Muslim man. Soon, she finds herself not only forced into marriage, but living in a new country as the borders between India and Pakistan are drawn.

summary_text: On a Sunday, Eileen Tyler, still a virgin, leaves Albany to visit her airline pilot brother in New York but a chance encounter with a man on a city bus threatens to derail her upcoming marriage to boyfriend Russ.

summary_text: A detective hunts for the marksman who foiled the plan to catch a notorious team of bank robbers.

name: Some Mother's Son
summary_text: The 1981 hunger strike in an Irish prison, in which I.R.A. prisoner Bobby Sands led a protest against their treatment as criminals rather than as prisoners of war. It focuses on the mothers of two of the strikers, and their struggle.

name: The Skin of the Wolf
summary_text: A highlander that lives alone in the mountains buys a wife to relieve his loneliness.

name: Un profil pour deux
summary_text: Pierre, a 75 year old widower, discovers online dating websites. Using the profile picture of Alex, his grand daughter's boyfriend, Pierre meets Flora. Charmed by his elegant conversations ...                See full summary »

name: Flirting with Forty
summary_text: A divorced mother approaching her 40th birthday falls for a younger man while on vacation.

name: Hard Core Logo
summary_text: A group of washed-up Canadian punk rockers get back together for a road trip in memory of a dear friend who was supposedly shot, or so rumors imply. As they travel, they ignore the underlying psychological darkness within each other.

name: Too Beautiful for You
summary_text: A sharp love triangle is formed by a wealthy businessman.

name: Le mani sulla città
summary_text: Prior to a city council election, the collapse of a building leaves a land developer and his political backers defending themselves against a scandal.

name: Up at the Villa
summary_text: A widow finds choosing a new husband might not be her choice at all, as the actions of her various prospects confine her freedom.

name: Tóngnián wangshì
summary_text: The semi-autobiographical film on director Hou Hsiao-Hsien's childhood and adolescence, when he was growing up in Taiwan, living through the deaths of his father, mother and grandmother.

name: Le marginal
summary_text: The story is about Commissioner Jordan who arrives in Marseille to combat drug trafficking activities in his own unique way.

name: To Joy
summary_text: Two violinists playing in the same orchestra fall in love and get married, but they can't get along.

name: S.M.A.R.T. Chase
summary_text: A washed-up private security agent has to escort a valuable Chinese antique out of Shanghai but is ambushed en route.

name: Barcode
summary_text: At a job interview, a conman recounts the recent events in his life that lead him to the meeting.

name: Ayalum Njanum Thammil...
summary_text: A story on how a brilliant and dedicated senior doctor molds an irresponsible amateur doctor into one much like him, and how a forbidden relationship comes in between.

name: Caffeine
summary_text: During one lunchtime at an offbeat coffee house, the relationships of the quirky staff and several couples are turned upside down by the sudden revelations of supremely embarrassing secrets about to their sexual behavior - and misbehavior.

name: Under the Rainbow
summary_text: A visiting dignitary, a CIA agent, a Nazi spy, Japanese tourists, an assassin and a group of "midget" actors from The Wizard of Oz (1939) all check into an elite Los Angeles hotel called Under the Rainbow.

name: Zero Charisma
summary_text: An overgrown nerd who serves as Game Master of a fantasy board game finds his role as leader of the misfits put into jeopardy when a new initiate enters the group.

name: Accidents Happen
summary_text: Billy, his parents, siblings and neighbors have their fair share of accidents in 1974 and 1982. Boys will be boys.

name: Retribution
summary_text: An experienced police detective has to investigate the murder of an unknown woman dressed in a scarlet dress.

name: Bashu, gharibeye koochak
summary_text: Lost in a foreign part of the country after running away for his life, a little boy whose family have been killed during the war is saved and trained by a middle-aged woman.

name: Quién te cantará
summary_text: When Lila, a celebrated but fame-weary and amnesiac singer forgets how to perform, super-fan Violeta steps in to teach Lila how to be Lila once again.

name: Long hang tian xia
summary_text: A former Chinese Kung Fu master working in L.A. as a medicine man is targeted by an ex-student, and it's up to one of his Hong Kong decibels, who's visiting America, to defend his master's honor.

name: Five Elements Ninjas
summary_text: When five ninjas whose fighting styles are based on natural elements unleash their fury on a rival school, a lone survivor vows deadly revenge.

name: Tiger Bay
summary_text: A twelve-year-old tomboy witnesses the murder of a woman by her Polish merchant marine boyfriend, but bonds with him and thwarts the police in their investigation.

name: First Spaceship on Venus
summary_text: When an alien artifact discovered on Earth is found to have come from Venus, an international team of astronauts embarks to investigate its origins.

name: The Midwife
summary_text: Claire is a wonderfully gifted midwife, with a natural talent to deliver babies with the most gentle touch. One day she receives a strange phone call. Béatrice, the extravagant mistress of her deceased father, wants to see her again.

name: Talih Kusu

summary_text: Romance and adventure happen during the America's Cup series of yachting races.

summary_text: War correspondent Roger East and the young Jose Ramos-Horta travel to East Timor to investigate the murders of the Balibo Five in 1975.

name: Let There Be Light
summary_text: An atheist goes through a near-death experience in a car accident before converting to Christianity.

name: Mamy
summary_text: This movie will surely make you believe in sincere mother's love for the second time.

summary_text: In ancient China, the seven heirs of the Yang family face a horde of enemies to rescue their father.

summary_text: A bitter land dispute causes a Civil War veteran to take extreme action.

name: Deterrence
summary_text: The President of the United States must deal with an international military crisis while confined to a Colorado diner during a freak snowstorm

name: Istoria mias kalpikis liras
summary_text: Pivoting around a shiny counterfeit gold sovereign freshly milled from the clandestine workshop of an otherwise honest goldsmith, four brief vignettes of human imperfection; seduction; fate; desire, and devotion inextricably interweave.

summary_text: A runaway criminal breaks into an eerie chateau, taking its two frightened chambermaids hostage. As night falls, a group of mysterious aristocratic women arrive and the criminal begins to realize the women are hiding a sinister secret.

summary_text: Tintin and his friends visit Professor Calculus at his country laboratory, only to find him and a pair of local children threatened by criminals after the inventor's work.

name: Black Beauty
summary_text: A wild horse and a teenage girl forge an unbreakable bond which keeps them connected for a lifetime.

name: The Matchbreaker
summary_text: A young professional breakup artist reaches a crisis when the girl he's hired to target is the girl he's always wanted.

name: Stranded
summary_text: 1st Mars mission crash lands, kills the captain and 5 survive. Help from Earth will take 2+ years. Food and electricity (recycling oxygen and water) shortage means only 2 can survive. The other 3 leave and have their last hours recorded.

name: Shree 420
summary_text: When a young man from a small town decides to make it big in a city, he faces several challenges.

name: Trick
summary_text: A no-nonsense detective tries to track down a mass murderer named Trick, who is terrorizing a small town.

name: I'm a Killer
summary_text: Inspired by true events from the 1970s, the story revolves around a young detective who becomes the head of a police unit focused on catching a rampant serial killer of women, nicknamed 'The Silesian Vampire'.

summary_text: After coming home from a Party gathering one night, a Czech official becomes convinced that he is about to be the subject of a political purge and tries to do damage control, while also dealing with his turbulent marriage.

summary_text: A former high school teacher turned unionist tries to organize workers laboring with inhuman conditions at a late 19th Century textile factory.

name: Star Kid
summary_text: Spencer Griffith's life changes when a meteor falls into a local junkyard, and he finds a Cybersuit, an exoskeleton with AI from another galaxy. When Spencer puts on the Cybersuit he becomes a different kind of person.

summary_text: Focusing on life, death and karma, this dark comedy follows three parallel tracks - a man who discovers that he is a terminally ill, a woman seeking redemption and two goons with major trust issues.

summary_text: A man estranged from his family receives word that his father has chosen to take himself off life support within forty-eight hours.

summary_text: A couple driving to a cemetery looking for inspiration for a horror story encounters the dancing dead.

name: Easy Virtue
summary_text: A recently divorced woman hides her scandalous past from her new husband and his family.

name: Gayby
summary_text: Jenn (straight) and Matt (gay) are best friends from college who are now in their thirties. Single by choice, they decide to fulfill a youthful promise to have a child together... the old fashioned way.

name: Film socialisme
summary_text: The passengers on a Mediterranean cruise enjoy their luxuries as a small family struggles with overbearing media attention.

name: Transylmania
summary_text: Spoof horror in which a group of college kids do a semester abroad in Romania and realise that if the partying doesn't kill them, the vampires just might!

name: Samurai Fiction
summary_text: A noble young samurai searches for a thief who has stolen a precious treasure and killed one of his clansmen and meets an older samurai who tries to deter him from the violence of revenge.

name: Blackbird
summary_text: A terminally ill mother arranges to bring her family together one last time before she dies. A remake of the 2014 Danish film 'Silent Heart'.

name: Parugu
summary_text: A group of friends are tasked with finding the daughter of a village head who believes them to have helped her elope.

name: Absurd
summary_text: A priest-doctor chasing a man with supernatural regenerative abilities, who has recently escaped from a medical lab, reaches a small town where the mutant goes on a killing spree.

name: The Brothers Karamazov
summary_text: Drama based on Russian writer Fyodor Dostoevsky's homonymous novel about the proud Karamazov family in 1870s Russia.

name: Family Blood
summary_text: Ellie, a recovering drug addict, moves to a new city with her two teenage children. Struggling to stay sober, her life changes when she meets Christopher, who is a different kind of addict.

name: The Killing Jar
summary_text: A stranger armed with a shotgun takes seven patrons hostage in a remote roadside diner. But as the body count increases, the desperate survivors discover that one of the hostages may be even more dangerous than their captor.

name: Hitch-Hike

name: Sebastiane
summary_text: Reassigned to a lowly outpost, a Roman guard's Christian beliefs clash with his gay commander's desire for closeness. Being tortured becomes pleasurable.

name: Diamantino
